Module ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2
Package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.shapes

Class Squiggle

java.lang.Object
ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.shapes.Shape
ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.shapes.Squiggle
Direct Known Subclasses:
Highlighter, Polyline, PrecisionEraser, SmartShape
public class Squiggle extends Shape
This class represents a squiggle on the canvas, which is an ordered set of points connected to each by a line. The points are defined on every left click drag of the mouse or release of the left mouse button

    • getPaintInfo

      public double[] getPaintInfo()
      Description copied from class: Shape
      Returns basic paint information for the shape, such as its coordinates and dimensions. This information is used by the GraphicsContext to render the shape correctly on the canvas.
      Specified by:
      getPaintInfo in class Shape
      Returns:
